Content_wSideColumn.Name: Registration
Content_wSideColumn.Title: Merit Badge Registration
Content_wSideColumn.Abstract: The Merit Badge Registration Page will lead you to the right direction of which merit badges you would like to sign up for. Registration for merit badge classes will be on a first come, first serve basis.

MoveLeft.label: Toggle column right or left (right is default)

fbookTop.label: Put facebook at top of page

fbookDisplayed.label: Number of facebook messages to display

Content_wSideColumn.BodyCopy:
Please, register for only two merit badges or one merit badge which runs all day (Citizenship in the World, Emergency Prep, First Aid, Lifesaving, or Personal Management). Also, do not sign the scout up for two merit badges during the same time period. Please register your son or Scout for no more than two merit badges. Please make sure that you have one for the first time period and one for the second time period. They will go to the same classes both weeks.

NOTE: Due to a conflict with the pool, the Lifesaving Merit Badge will need to run from 8 to 11 a.m. on the first Saturday, only. Please consider this when registering.

Register For PowWow

Registration Cost

The cost to register for the merit badge powwow is $12 and this includes the cost of the merit badges. You may pay with a Visa or Master Card.

Registration Dates

  • Registration will begin on Thursday, September 1, 2011, at 9 a.m.
  • Registration for merit badge classes will be on a first come, first serve basis.
  • Registration will close on Thursday, October 20, 2011, at 5 p.m
  • No Registration at the door!

Additonal Registration Information

  • If you are employed by BYU-Idaho, please DO NOT use your Net ID to enroll your son. The information needs to be his and not yours.
  • Be sure to include an e-mail address, as we will be communicating through e-mail.
